dependencies.description:
Docutils is an open-source text processing system for processing
plaintext documentation into useful formats, such as HTML, LaTeX, man-
pages, open-document or XML. It includes reStructuredText, the easy to
read, easy to use, what-you-see-is-what-you-get plaintext markup
language.
dependencies.name: py-docutils

dependencies.description: A lexer and codec to work with LaTeX code in Python.
dependencies.name: py-latexcodec

dependencies.description: Set that remembers original insertion order.
dependencies.name: py-oset

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description: Pybtex is a BibTeX-compatible bibliography processor written in Python.
dependencies.name: py-pybtex

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description: Elephant is a package for analysis of electrophysiology data in Python
dependent_to.name: py-elephant

dependent_to.description:
WAVES (LANL code C23004) is a computational science and engineering
workflow tool that integrates parametric studies with traditional
software build systems.
dependent_to.name: py-waves

description: A Sphinx extension for BibTeX style citations.
name: py-sphinxcontrib-bibtex

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
